name: gmd:CI_Package
desc: Physical and email address at which the organisation or individual may be contacted.

children.name: gmd:CI_Address
children.desc: Physical and email address at which the organisation or individual may be contacted.

children.name: gmd:deliveryPoint
children.desc: Address line for the location.

children.name: gmd:city
children.desc: City of the address.

children.name: gmd:administrativeArea
children.desc: State or province of the address.

children.name: gmd:postalCode
children.desc: Administrative spatial code which assists mail and parcel delivery.

children.name: gmd:country
children.desc: Country of the physical address.

children.name: gmd:electronicMailAddress
children.desc: The electronic mailbox address of the responsible organisation or individual.

children.name: gmd:CI_Citation
children.desc: Bibliographic information to reference the resource.

children.name: gmd:title
children.desc: Name by which the cited resource is known.

children.name: gmd:alternateTitle
children.desc: Short name or other language name by which the cited information is known.

children.name: gmd:date
children.desc: Reference date for the cited resource; reference date and event used to describe it.

children.name: gmd:CI_Date
children.desc: The date in which the event or action occurred.

children.name: gmd:date
children.desc: The date in which the event or action occurred.

children.name: gmd:dateType
children.desc: Identification of the event used for the temporal aspects in the resource.

children.name: gmd:identifier
children.desc: A unique value that identifies an object in a given namespace.

children.name: gmd:otherCitationDetails
children.desc: Other information to complete a citation.

children.desc: Information on the Internet available resource.

children.desc: A uniform resource locator.
